content.body: https://github.com/gpuweb/gpuweb/pull/2416 has some additional WebGPU and <canvas> integration discussion, if anyone's interested. (Been trying to steer them in a direction that more closely matches the existing contexts. It seems this went unnoticed in the TAG review.)
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: https://github.com/gpuweb/gpuweb/pull/2416 has some additional WebGPU and <canvas> integration discussion, if anyone's interested. (Been trying to steer them in a direction that more closely matches the existing contexts. It seems this went unnoticed in the TAG review.)
